price: Kadhaalika; na tukawarithisha hayo Wana wa Israili.
footnotes: Ni kutoka kama huku kwa ajabu tulivyo kueleza ndivyo tulivyo watoa, na tukawapa ufalme huo na kila namna ya neema zilizo kuwamo Wana wa Israili, baada ya kuwa masikini hawana mbele wala nyuma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And We caused to inherit them
